surname Guo
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: Don"t burn any bridges as it is a small world 24."
sentences.chinese: 不要過河拆橋，世界很小，你會有報應的。

sentences.english: Don't burn bridges you may have to cross again.
sentences.chinese: 不要過河拆橋，你可能要再使用它。

sentences.english: Don't burn any bridges as it is a small world.
sentences.chinese: 不要過河拆橋，世界很小，保不準哪天你們會再遇到。

sentences.english: I am pained by the allegations that we engage in use and throw.
sentences.chinese: 當聽到我們過河拆橋的指責時我感到痛苦。
